greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number A(n,k) of ordered set partitions of [n] with at most k elements per block; square array A(n,k), n>=0, k>=0, read by antidiagonals.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Antidiagonals n = 0..140, flattened
maple: A:= proc(n, k) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, add(
mathematica: A[n_, k_] := A[n, k] = If[n==0, 1, Sum[A[n-i, k]*Binomial[n, i], {i, 1, Min[n, k]}]]; Table[A[n, d-n], {d, 0, 12}, {n, 0, d}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 03 2017, translated from Maple *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 22 2016
